sect1.title: Connecting from XChat
sect1.para: Question: I have set up ctrlproxy, but nothing happens when I connect to it via the XChat client.
Answer: Ctrlproxy needs a password. Use the following /server command : /server hostname port password.

sect1.title: Supported operating systems
sect1.para: Question: On what operating systems does ctrlproxy run?
Answer: It has been tested with all major Linux distributions and FreeBSD. However, it should run on pretty much every OS that is POSIX-compatible.
